description: Lists all entities in a workspace.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: A list of objects that filter the request. (dict) --- An object that filters items in a list of entities. parentEntityId (string) --- The parent of the entities in the list. componentTypeId (string) --- The ID of the component type in the entities in the list. externalId (string) --- The external-Id property of a component. The external-Id property is the primary key of an external storage system.

nested_params.name: parentEntityId
nested_params.description: The parent of the entities in the list.

nested_params.name: componentTypeId
nested_params.description: The ID of the component type in the entities in the list.

nested_params.name: externalId
nested_params.description: The external-Id property of a component. The external-Id property is the primary key of an external storage system.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return at one time. The default is 25. Valid Range: Minimum value of 1. Maximum value of 250.

nested_items.name: entitySummaries
nested_items.description: A list of objects that contain information about the entities.

nested_items.name: parentEntityId
nested_items.description: The ID of the parent entity.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The current state of the entity, component, component type, or workspace.

nested_items.name: hasChildEntities
nested_items.description: An eventual Boolean value that specifies whether the entity has child entities or not.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the entity was created.

nested_items.name: updateDateTime
nested_items.description: The last date and time when the entity was updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The string that specifies the next page of results.
